title: Oma's Creamy Chocolate Fudge
markdown:
### Summary

Nathan,

Oma Dianne has some of the best recipes! When she decided to move from her home into assisted living she allowed me to have her recipe cards. I have not made all of them but I can almost guarantee they are the best. Just like you and your soon to be little brother. I love you dearly.

Mom

### Ingredients

* ¾ cups evaporated milk
* 1 jar marshmallow cream
* ¼ cup butter 
* 1 ½ cup sugar
* ¼ tsp salt
* 2 6oz packages semisweet chocolate chips
* 1 tsp vanilla extract
### Preparation

* Mix milk, marshmallow, butter, sugar and salt in saucepan
* Bring to boil, stirring 
* Boil for 5 min over med heat
* Remove from heat and add chocolate chips and vanilla extract
* Stir until smooth
* Turn out into a greased 8x8x2 square pan
* Chill for several hours, cut into squares
